name: Maria Santos
description: Compassionate caregiver from Philippines with 8 years of experience in elderly care.

comments.author: Mary S.
comments.text: Maria provided excellent care for my mother. Very professional and caring.

comments.author: John D.
comments.text: Great communication and reliable. Highly recommend!

name: Nguyen Thanh
description: Specializes in post-operative care and physical therapy support. Originally from Vietnam.

comments.author: Sarah L.
comments.text: Thanh helped me recover after my surgery. Very knowledgeable and patient.

name: Siti Rahman
description: Friendly and reliable caregiver from Malaysia, with a focus on creating a positive environment.

comments.author: Emma T.
comments.text: Siti is amazing! My grandmother loves spending time with her.

comments.author: Michael R.
comments.text: Professional, friendly, and goes above and beyond. Couldn't be happier!

name: Wati Sari
description: Experienced caregiver from Indonesia, specializing in dementia and Alzheimer's care.

comments.author: Robert K.
comments.text: Wati's expertise with dementia care is exceptional. Very understanding and patient.
